headline: 2025-10-27 — ArXiv paper authors utilized 1 simple RLC circuit (1 RLC circuit) to illustrate the proposed interactive energy state-space model and distributed output-feedback control.

2025-10-28 — ArXiv paper authors implemented 1 intermediate reactive-power control command (1 unit of reactive power command) to the lower-layer physical model, using either Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) or Sliding Mode Control (SMC).

2025-10-29 — ArXiv paper authors presented an autonomous flight controller for 1 quadcopter (1 UAV) with thrust-vectoring (tilt-motion enabled rotors) and evaluated performance via numerical simulations for attitude-step tracking and waypoint navigation.

2025-10-30 — UAV controller designers applied quaternion state feedback to eliminate dependence on Euler-angle trigonometric parameters, effectively reducing trigonometric-parameter dependence to 0 (0 trigonometric parameters) and avoiding gimbal lock for the attitude controller.
